title: EV charging, Lush landscaped interior courtyard, Glass shower surround
posting_body: Palo Alto’s most desirable collection of new homes.
Arbora offers a boutique collection of 19 brand-new residences nestled on a tranquil street in the heart of downtown Palo Alto.
Walk to University Avenue, Stanford, Cal Train, or Whole Foods, enjoying a vibrant dining and shopping scene.
Or relax and recharge at home, enjoying skyline views from the trellised rooftop deck with a dining area, lounges, fire pit, and outdoor kitchen.
Each residence has been uniquely designed to maximize livability, carefully considering light, space, and experience.
With floor-to-ceiling windows, hardwood floors, soaring ceilings, and sophisticated finishes, the vibrancy of downtown living now meets the beauty of modern design.
We invite you to enjoy elegant architecture, unparalleled convenience, and curated amenities at Arbora.
Call to speak with our leasing team today!
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Please contact us today for the most up-to-date information.
